attributes.action: Require local authorities to provide adequate parking facilities for touring caravans and motorhomes in and around town and cities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the government to recognise the taking of holidays in the UK by touring caravan or motorhome as a low-carbon alternative to flying abroad.  We ask that government support those who do so by requiring or encouraging local authorities to make adequate provision for the short-term parking of such vehicles in or around towns and cities and to not restrict access to such parking by height limiting barriers.
